General.Name: Bright Green Corp
General.Description: Bright Green Corporation focuses on the cultivation, manufacture, and sale of cannabis and cannabis-related products. Its products are used in research, pharmaceutical applications, and affiliated exports. The company was incorporated in 2019 and is based in Grants, New Mexico.
General.Address: 1033 George Hanosh Boulevard, Grants, NM, United States, 87020
